column4: dear friends why can I do increase windows partition and not ubuntu partition?
use gparted from a livecd to re-size
you don't have a hard disk'??? then what are you trying to partiton
what has that got to do with anything ?
ok - you need to make sure your disks are not mounted, and there is free space available NEXT to the partition you want to resize
repeating the same thing won't change anything, I've read that, and I'm advising you what to do
1.) make sure the partitions are unmounted 2.) make sure there is free space NEXT to the partition you want to resize
right click the partitions in gparted, there is normally an unmount option
make sure there is freespace NEXT to the partition you want to restore
ok, I'm not interested in helping you any more as you just repeat the same thing over and over
